Sentencas: Fuel cells probably represent the power-production technology receiving the most development attention.
Titulo: Novel fuzzy flux control for fuel-cell inverters

Sentencas: The objective of this paper is to regulate the output voltage of inverters for fuel-cell power plants.
Titulo: Novel fuzzy flux control for fuel-cell inverters

Sentencas: This letter describes an effective fuzzy-logic (FL) flux control.
Titulo: Novel fuzzy flux control for fuel-cell inverters

Sentencas: The paper demonstrates that the proposed method provides an improved response compared to the conventional flux-control method.
Titulo: Novel fuzzy flux control for fuel-cell inverters
